mapper.select: SELECT memPwd FROM member WHERE memId=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT member(memId, memPwd, memEmail, memName, memBirth, memTelcom, memGender, memNation, memHP) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{memEmail}, #{memName}, #{memBirth}, #{memTelcom}, #{memGender}, #{memNation}, #{memHp})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET memName = #{memName}, memEmail = #{memEmail}, memHP = #{memHp}, memPwd = #{memPwd} WHERE memId = #{memId}
